text:
Local Government Order (No. 3) 2012

After consultation with the Launceston City Council and being satisfied that it is appropriate to do so, I make the following order under section 140(2) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

16 August 2012

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Order (No. 3) 2012 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to Launceston City Council
    The land situated at 205-209 Windermere Road, Windermere in Tasmania comprised in certificate of title Volume 241479, Folio 1 of the register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 , is transferred to the Launceston City Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 5 September 2012

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
